      • getClipMeta

        public static java.lang.String[] getClipMeta(java.lang.String slug)
        Parameters:
        slug - strange blob of words
        Returns:
        array [ title, channel ]

      • getStreamMeta

        public static int[] getStreamMeta(java.lang.String channelID)
        Returns data about live stream. Array contains: [ viewers, average FPS, stream delay ]. If the channel is offline, an empty array is returned.
        Parameters:
        channelID - Twitch ID for broadcaster
        Returns:
        array [viewers, FPS, delay] or [] if offline

      • getVideoMeta

        public static java.lang.String[] getVideoMeta(java.lang.String id)
        Parameters:
        id - video id
        Returns:
        array of [ title, description, channel ]

      • getUserFollowsChannelMeta

        public static java.lang.String getUserFollowsChannelMeta(java.lang.String id,
                                                         java.lang.String channelID)
        Format is 2017-05-24T02:26:43Z
        Parameters:
        id - id of user
        channelID - id of target channel
        Returns:
        Date user followed channel. null if user doesn't follow channel or other error occurred.

      • getUserMeta

        public static java.lang.String[] getUserMeta(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - username of user
        Returns:
        array of [ userId, display_name ]

      • getChatMeta

        public static java.lang.String[][] getChatMeta(java.lang.String channelName)
        Retrieves channel chat users. Currently only retrieves viewers and mods. This is a problem because Global Mods and Admins are in their own groups. (An extremely rare problem)
        Parameters:
        channelName - username of broadcaster
        Returns:
        array of [ viewers[], moderators[] ]
